lead_paragraph: The people under arrest are suspected of planning an attack in Malaysia and collecting funds for the Islamic State, the country’s police chief said.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Malaysia: 15 Arrested in ISIS Inquiry

snippet: The people under arrest are suspected of planning an attack in Malaysia and collecting funds for the Islamic State, the country’s police chief said.
abstract: Malaysian authorities arrest 15 people over suspected link to Islamic State.
